item.title: Tent Peg Lane car park by the yellow barway, 23rd December
item.description:
Two signs have been put up in Tent Peg Lane car park, both of which are incorrect. They state that the opening time is 7.30am Mon-Fri, 9.00am weekends and Bank Holidays. It has long been the case that this car park is not opened until 9.00am on a Mon-Fri in order to stop commuter parking. This isn't the first time the wrong signs have been put up here. Please can they be replaced.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tent Peg Lane, Petts Wood, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Puddle and mud collects on road at drop kerb, 23rd December
item.description:
Since Shortlands Road was re-surfaced, the drop kerb at the bottom of the driveway of 31 Shortlands Road is lower than the surrounding road and pavement. As a result, water and mud tends to collect there. Over time, this will wear away at the surface and make a larger hole. It should be higher so that water and mud runs away to the drain, as works well on the rest of the length of the road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shortlands Road, Shortlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mattress on pavement, 23rd December
item.description:
No 57 Bethel Road wads cleared out by the council last week who arranged a skip. When the skip arrived on Saturday morning as it was piled too high the skip driver took it off and leaned it up against No 57â€™s wall. However this mattress has been blown down in the wind blocking the pathway. Could you please arrange as soon as possible for the mattress to be taken away as there are plenty of foxes who will rip it open and cause havoc. Itâ€™s a problem for people walking past with push chairs, or blind or partially blind etc as the pathway is blocked and they will have to walk out in the road to go past so this is dangerous.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bethel Road, Welling, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
